Line 16: Line 16:
'''PowerISO''' is an [[software application|application]] used to create, open, [[Virtual drive|mount]] / [[Disk image emulator|emulate]], [[Data compression|compress]], [[Encryption|encrypt]], and otherwise manipulate [[Compact disk|CD]] / [[DVD]] [[Disk image|image files]]. It is most commonly known for its proprietary [[Direct Access Archive|DAA]] disc image format. Other supported formats include [[ISO image|ISO]], [[Cue sheet (computing)|BIN]], [[NRG (file format)|NRG]], and [[DiscJuggler|CDI]]. PowerISO is able to modify all supported CD images formats, most notably ISO. The trial version cannot create or edit images greater than 300 megabytes<ref name="powerisofaq">[http://poweriso.com/faq.htm PowerISO - Create, Edit, Extract, Mount, Compress, Encrypt, Split ISO file, ISO/BIN converter, Virtual Drive, DAA<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>, but can burn files of any size to disc.
'''PowerISO''' is an [[software application|application]] used to create, open, [[Virtual drive|mount]] / [[Disk image emulator|emulate]], [[Data compression|compress]], [[Encryption|encrypt]], and otherwise manipulate [[Compact disk|CD]] / [[DVD]] [[Disk image|image files]]. It is most commonly known for its proprietary [[Direct Access Archive|DAA]] disc image format. Other supported formats include [[ISO image|ISO]], [[Cue sheet (computing)|BIN]], [[NRG (file format)|NRG]], and [[DiscJuggler|CDI]]. PowerISO is able to modify all supported CD images formats, most notably ISO. The trial version cannot create or edit images greater than 300 megabytes<ref name="powerisofaq">[http://poweriso.com/faq.htm PowerISO - Create, Edit, Extract, Mount, Compress, Encrypt, Split ISO file, ISO/BIN converter, Virtual Drive, DAA<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>, but can burn files of any size to disc.
â
Currently produced by PowerISO Computing, Inc. located in China.

Currently produced by PowerISO Computing, Inc. located in China.{{fact}}
